item.title: Backup org files in github
item.description:
tl;dr I used the snippets here to backup my emacs org files, however it can be used for any file. The cron-job invokes backup_files_to_github.sh, once every 15 minutes, to push org files available in the ~/org directory to a github repository.
NOWT=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %T") git add . git commit -m "$NOWTAutomated git push" git push Code Snippet 1: backup_files_to_github.sh */15 * * * * cd ~/org && .
